welcome_message_body: Welcome to Barangka, Philippines! Prepare to be enchanted by the city's rich history, vibrant culture, and warm hospitality. Explore and indulge in all that Barangka has to offer, and make unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, exclusively used by Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights at Ninoy Aquino International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A small domestic terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, mainly used by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be slow or intermittent.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baler Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
